MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Body Cognition Questionnaire

Reference:
Miller, L. C., Murphy, R., & Buss, A. H. (1981). Consciousness of Body: Private and Public. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 41(2), 397.

Assessing:
'... self-report measure of the private and public aspects of the body in neutral (nonaffective) state' (Miller et al., 1981, page 398)
